name: Banana Run!
description:
Banana Run! is a simple endless runner where you have to survive as long as possible. You have to overcome the obstacles like apes, stones and birds. You can jump over them or you can just shoot at them with coconuts which you can collect.

Mud platforms: You can jump at them to overcome the obstacles better. But beware: The platforms slow you down!

Controls:

  • Up / W: (Double) Jump
  • Space / F: Shoot
  • Esc: Pause
